body:
Hi, a minor issue but THPP fails to build with MSVC, because it does not support variable length arrays.
THTensor::catArray and THCTensor::catArray use a variable length array to hold a temporary array of pointers.

At THPP/tensors/generic/THTensor.cpp:
```c_cpp
template<>
auto THCTensor<real>::catArray(const std::vector<Tensor*>& inputs_vec,
                              int dimension) -> THCTensor& {
  int numInputs = inputs_vec.size();
  tensor_type *inputs[numInputs];
  ...
```
